The Beginning Of Ragnarox..........Chapter 3 The New Monster
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Beginning Of Ragnarox..........Chapter 3 The New Monster
By Zercker on Tuesday, July 8, 2008 - 09:45 am:

Beware Im a little rusty
...............................
"Unlock!" Yelled Drew. Genn and Drew just got back from a tourney and found Chi with a disk. The disk turned into a red ball and started to expand. The red light turned into a Mask Worm. A Worm/Gali. "I will name you"...... Drew thought for a second. "Beserker!" Yelled Drew.

MEANWHILE.........................
Thump, thump, thump an army of monsters march into town!!!!!!!!!
